title: Plain, chilli or spinach chapattis
ingredients: ['425 g (15 oz) chapatti flour, plus extra for dusting', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons sunflower oil', 'For chilli chapattis', '1 green chilli, deseeded and finely chopped', '1 fresh red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped', 'A pinch of cayenne pepper', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', 'For spinach chapattis', '1 green chilli, deseeded and finely chopped', '2 teaspoons garlic purée, or crushed garlic', '1 teaspoon finely grated ginger', '250 g (9 oz) spinach leaves, rinsed and finely chopped', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper']
